data.title: wasn't as pleasant as I orginally thought
data.text: I decided to go here for facials as it was on my way home from work. I liked the zenful ambiance. However, when it came to the point when I realized I was overcharged my credit card and requested for the difference to be credited back, I got a very poor response. I had to call back several times in order to get a response and there was no apology for making the mistake. Due to this, I refused to go back.

data.title: Truly a haven of wellness!
data.text: Whilst in Huntington Beach, I visited Haven of Wellness on recommendation of the hotel receptionist .  I had suffered a migraine  for a week and was in need of a vigorous massage.  The owner, Crystal, was able to get me in quickly and was very kind.  Heather's massage was divine as was Janeen's facial and I left Haven of Wellness feeling on top form.  I so enjoyed it that I went back the next day for another massage - the Aroma Touch.  Please  don't hesitate to visit this Spa.  When I return to Huntington Beach, I know I will!
